metadata.summary: Ingest AWS GuardDuty threat detection findings via S3 bucket or SQS queue for intelligent security monitoring
metadata.primary_use_case: Collect and analyze AWS GuardDuty security findings for threat detection and incident response

extracted_apis.path: ./lc_adapter s3 client_options.identity.installation_key=<INSTALLATION_KEY> client_options.identity.oid=<OID> client_options.platform=guard_duty bucket_name=<BUCKET> access_key=<KEY> secret_key=<SECRET> client_options.hostname=guardduty-logs
extracted_apis.description: Create S3 adapter for AWS GuardDuty logs with guard_duty platform type

extracted_apis.path: ./lc_adapter sqs client_options.identity.installation_key=<INSTALLATION_KEY> client_options.identity.oid=<OID> client_options.platform=guard_duty client_options.sensor_seed_key=<SENSOR_SEED_KEY> client_options.hostname=guardduty-logs access_key=<KEY> secret_key=<SECRET> queue_url=<QUEUE_URL> region=<AWS-REGION>
extracted_apis.description: Create SQS adapter for AWS GuardDuty logs with guard_duty platform type

cross_refs.description: S3 adapter type used to collect GuardDuty findings from S3 buckets
SQS adapter type used to collect GuardDuty findings from SQS queues
Similar AWS adapter for CloudTrail logs, shares deployment patterns and AWS integration approach
